branding.name: Passenger
branding.slogan: Because your security should not be a passenger on someone else's vehicle.

recovery.title: Cover your Vault
recovery.description: A recovery key is automatically generated for you. If you forget your passphrase, you can use this key to recover your Vault. You should save it in a safe place. Think it is the PUK on Sim card of your Vault.
recovery.warning: DO NOT LOSE THIS KEY. IF YOU LOSE IT, YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO RECOVER YOUR VAULT.

checkIfNoted.title: Double Checking
checkIfNoted.description: I wonder if you have saved your recovery key in a safe place. Can you write it down?

letsStart.title: Let's Start
letsStart.description: You are all set! You can now start using your Vault.

forgotPassphrase.title: Forgot My Keys
forgotPassphrase.description: While creating your Vault, we have generated a recovery key for you. The PUK code of your Vault. Remember it? It's required now.

assignedPassphrase.title: Assigned Passphrase
assignedPassphrase.description: Here is your new passphrase. You can change it after login.

errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.alreadyInitialized: You have already initialized your Vault.
